name: Carl Franklin's Blazor Desk Show with Dan Roth
description: March 26, 2020 - Video of Carl Franklin (from .NET Rocks!) about architecture best practices, how to make and consume generic components, how to call JavaScript to enhance your apps, and how to implement authentication and authorization. This video also covers how to monitor the traffic going back and forth between the browser and the server, measure your app's memory footprint, and how to optimize it. It also introduces some exciting Blazor controls including a data grid and appointment scheduling component.

name: Using CSLA 5: Blazor and WebAssembly
description: This book covers the new Blazor UI framework, including how to create server-side and client-side WebAssembly projects, how to implement authentication and authorization, and how to use data binding. It then covers how CSLA .NET supports Blazor, including walking through a complete sample app.
